content.raw:
I just introduced a major restructuring of the implementation to make the concept work for plugins.

I've also added an integration test that uses a mock plugin that provides a mock feature. The test can be found in `test/integration/FeatureSystem.cc`, and the mock plugin implementation can be found in `test/plugins/mock.cc`.

Right now the test only has the plugin implementing one feature, so I think the next step should be to add (at least) one more feature to it. Next week, I might have to shift gears towards SOSS work, since we have some hard deadlines coming up, but I may be able to add to the test this weekend.
content.html:
I just introduced a major restructuring of the implementation to make the concept work for plugins.

I've also added an integration test that uses a mock plugin that provides a mock feature. The test can be found in test/integration/FeatureSystem.cc, and the mock plugin implementation can be found in test/plugins/mock.cc.

Right now the test only has the plugin implementing one feature, so I think the next step should be to add (at least) one more feature to it. Next week, I might have to shift gears towards SOSS work, since we have some hard deadlines coming up, but I may be able to add to the test this weekend.
